mapper.select: SELECT EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT.ROOM_CD AS roomCd /* 객실 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT.APPLY_DD AS applyDd /* 적용 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT.TOT_ROOM_CNT AS totRoomCnt /* 총 객실 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT.SALE_ROOM_CNT AS saleRoomCnt /* 판매 객실 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT.SALE_AMT AS saleAmt /* 판매 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT.AUTO_END_YN AS autoEndYn /* 자동 마감 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT /* 직영/숙박 객실 금액 */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM /* 직영/숙박 객실 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT.ROOM_CD = EZC_DIST_ROOM.ROOM_CD AND EZC_DIST_ROOM.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_DIST_ROOM.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_FACL.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_AREA_CD.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CITY_CD.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_PARTNER.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT.ROOM_CD = #{roomCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 객실 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT.APPLY_DD = #{applyDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 적용 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT /* 직영/숙박 객실 금액 */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM /* 직영/숙박 객실 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT.ROOM_CD = EZC_DIST_ROOM.ROOM_CD AND EZC_DIST_ROOM.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_DIST_ROOM.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_FACL.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_AREA_CD.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CITY_CD.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_PARTNER.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT.ROOM_CD = #{roomCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 객실 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT.APPLY_DD = #{applyDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 적용 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* #### SQL Body [[ ################# */ SELECT EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT.ROOM_CD AS roomCd /* 객실 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT.APPLY_DD AS applyDd /* 적용 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT.TOT_ROOM_CNT AS totRoomCnt /* 총 객실 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT.SALE_ROOM_CNT AS saleRoomCnt /* 판매 객실 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT.SALE_AMT AS saleAmt /* 판매 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT.AUTO_END_YN AS autoEndYn /* 자동 마감 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT /* 직영/숙박 객실 금액 */ ,EZC_DIST_ROOM /* 직영/숙박 객실 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT.ROOM_CD = EZC_DIST_ROOM.ROOM_CD AND EZC_DIST_ROOM.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_DIST_ROOM.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_FACL.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_AREA_CD.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CITY_CD.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_PARTNER.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT.ROOM_CD = #{param.roomCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 객실 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT.APPLY_DD = #{param.applyDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 적용 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */
ORDER BY EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT.ROOM_CD DESC /* #### SQL Body ]] ################# */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT SET /* 직영/숙박 객실 금액 */ TOT_ROOM_CNT = #{totRoomCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 총 객실 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,SALE_ROOM_CNT = #{saleRoomCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 판매 객실 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,SALE_AMT = #{saleAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 판매 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,AUTO_END_YN = #{autoEndYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 자동 마감 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ WHERE 1=1 AND ROOM_CD = #{roomCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 객실 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND APPLY_DD = #{applyDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 적용 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_DIST_ROOM_AMT /* 직영/숙박 객실 금액 */ WHERE 1=1 AND ROOM_CD = #{roomCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 객실 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND APPLY_DD = #{applyDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 적용 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */
